DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Neuramis® Volume Lidocaine effective temporary restore mid-face volume .
DOC.brief_title: Neuramis® Volume Lidocaine Treatment Patients With Loss Mid-face Volume
DOC.detailed_description: This study multi-center , randomize , evaluator subject blind , comparative medical device pivotal clinical trial . Efficacy safety evaluate appointed time subject visit clinical site inject medical device .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject age 35 65 . 2 . Subject want correct his/her midface volume deficit . 3 . Subject agree receive cosmetic procedure cosmetic surgery study period . 4 . Subjects voluntarily decide participation study sign informed consent . 1 . Subjects previous treatment midface restoring volume . 2 . Subjects skin lesion cause congenital defect , trauma lipodystrophy etc . 3 . Subjects hypersensitivity local anesthetic amide type lidocaine . 4 . Pregnant , lactate subject childbearing subject disagree medically acceptable contraception . 5 . Subjects receive investigational product within 4 week prior study participation schedule take part clinical trial study period . 6 . Subjects medical history anaphylaxis severe complex allergy . 7 . Subjects mental disease affect study severe disorder cardiovascular system , digestive system , respiratory system , endocrine system central nervous system . 8 . Patients eligible study medical discretion investigator .
